wikipedia_page.main: Gary Simpson (born 10 June 1959, in Chesterfield) is an English former footballer who played as a forward. He played in The Football League for Chesterfield and Chester City.

response: Gary Simpson (born 11 April 1961) is an English football manager and former player.
*Gary Simpson (footballer, born 1959), English former footballer; forward for Chesterfield and Chester City amongst others
*Gary Simpson (footballer, born 1961), English former footballer and manager; midfielder for Boston United, Stafford Rangers and Arnold Town amongst others
